import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import AddCategoryForm from "./AddCategoryForm"; import { ca } from "../../dummyData"; const AdminMain = () => { const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); const [usersCount, setUsersCount] = useState(0); const [postsCount, setPostsCount] = useState(0); const [comments, setComments] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { // محاكاة جلب البيانات setCategories(dummyCategories); setUsersCount(dummyUsersCount); setPostsCount(dummyPostsCount); setComments(dummyComments); }, []); return (
Users
{usersCount}
See all users
Posts

See all posts
Categories
{categories.length}
See all categories
Comments

See all comments
); } export default AdminMain;
